thread.title: Khalid - Location (Remix) Feat. Lil Wayne & Kehlani
thread.title_full: Khalid - Location (Remix) Feat. Lil Wayne & Kehlani

author: Shaun M
title: Khalid - Location (Remix) Feat. Lil Wayne & Kehlani
text:
0 MAKE IT STOP Khalid hooks up with Lil Wayne and Kehlani for the remix of "Location." 
This week, hot new R&B crooner Khalid got the opportunity of a lifetime to perform his hit "Location" on Jimmy Fallon . His good luck continued on Friday when a remix featuring Lil Wayne and Kehlani dropped into our collective lap. 
The song about pure love has slowly grown in popularity since its release last year. Though the remix is backed by the same production, Weezy and Kehlani add an obvious cachet to the track. The songstress in particular, lend her amazing vocal chops to the Khalid's low key style. Lil Tunechi offers sweet lovey-dovey bars that Drake fans will surely appreciate. But most of all, the additions don't overshadow Khalid's unique swag. 
Listen to "Location (remix)" right here.
